title: Devils Advocate

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, Target a player; if lynched tomorrow they will not be.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You may not target the same player twice in a row

desc:
Post 3671
*‚ÄùMy client, should the objection be overruled, pleads innocent by virtue of the prosecution's non-observance of statute 27.B - incorrect or misleading conjugation of a verb. The fact that nine of the jury died last night is simply prima face, which is, as Wills vs Thule set precedent for, further reason to acquit."*
